title: Mediterranean seafood salad
ingredients: ['2 red peppers, quartered and seeded', '225 g (8 oz) raw king or tiger prawns, peeled', '500 g (1 lb 2 oz) mussels in shells, scrubbed', '125 g (4½ oz) scallops, preferably small bay scallops or queens', '200 g (7 oz) linguine, preferably black squid-ink linguine', '1 tbsp capers in brine, rinsed', 'salt and pepper', 'Poaching liquid', '1 fresh red chilli (optional)', '1 garlic clove', '240 ml (8 fl oz) dry white wine', '1 bay leaf', '1 lemon, thinly sliced', '1 shallot, thinly sliced', 'Dressing', '4 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '1½ tbsp lemon juice', 'To serve', '1 head radicchio', '2 tbsp finely chopped fresh parsley', '1 lemon, cut into wedges']
